casebody.data:
Frank CARABALLO, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
CITY OF JERSEY CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT, a Municipal Entity, and Thomas Comey, Individually and in His Representative Capacity, Defendants-Petitioners. C-940 September Term 2017
080467 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000758-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
